26 #ifndef TILEDARRAY_EXPRESSIONS_EXPR_ENGINE_H__INCLUDED
27 #define TILEDARRAY_EXPRESSIONS_EXPR_ENGINE_H__INCLUDED
28 
29 #include <TiledArray/expressions/expr_trace.h>
30 #include <TiledArray/external/madness.h>
31 
32 namespace TiledArray {
33 namespace expressions {
34 
35 // Forward declarations
36 template <typename>
37 struct EngineParamOverride;
38 template <typename>
39 class Expr;
40 template <typename>
41 struct EngineTrait;
42 
44 template <typename Derived>
45 class ExprEngine : private NO_DEFAULTS {
46  public:
47  typedef ExprEngine<Derived> ExprEngine_;
48  typedef Derived derived_type;
49 
50  // Operational typedefs
51  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::value_type
52  value_type;
53  typedef
54  typename EngineTrait<Derived>::op_type op_type;
55  typedef
56  typename EngineTrait<Derived>::policy policy;
57  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::dist_eval_type
58  dist_eval_type;
59 
60  // Meta data typedefs
61  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::size_type size_type;
62  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::trange_type
63  trange_type;
64  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::shape_type
65  shape_type;
66  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::pmap_interface
67  pmap_interface;
68 
69  protected:
70  // The member variables of this class are protected because derived
71  // classes will customize initialization.
72 
73  World* world_;
74  VariableList vars_;
75  bool permute_tiles_;
76  Permutation perm_;
78  trange_type trange_;
79  shape_type shape_;
80  std::shared_ptr<pmap_interface>
81  pmap_;
82  std::shared_ptr<EngineParamOverride<Derived> >
83  override_ptr_;
84 
85  public:
87 
89  template <typename D>
90  ExprEngine(const Expr<D>& expr)
91  : world_(NULL),
92  vars_(),
93  permute_tiles_(true),
94  perm_(),
95  trange_(),
96  shape_(),
97  pmap_(),
98  override_ptr_(expr.override_ptr_) {}
99 
101 
109  void init(World& world, std::shared_ptr<pmap_interface> pmap,
110  const VariableList& target_vars) {
111  if (target_vars.dim()) {
112  derived().init_vars(target_vars);
113  derived().init_struct(target_vars);
114  } else {
115  derived().init_vars();
116  derived().init_struct(vars_);
117  }
118 
119  auto override_world = override_ptr_ != nullptr && override_ptr_->world;
120  auto override_pmap = override_ptr_ != nullptr && override_ptr_->pmap;
121  world_ = override_world ? override_ptr_->world : &world;
122  pmap_ = override_pmap ? override_ptr_->pmap : pmap;
123 
124  // Check for a valid process map.
125  if (pmap_) {
126  // If process map is not valid, use the process map constructed by the
127  // expression engine.
128  if ((typename pmap_interface::size_type(world_->size()) !=
129  pmap_->procs()) ||
130  (trange_.tiles_range().volume() != pmap_->size()))
131  pmap_.reset();
132  }
133 
134  derived().init_distribution(world_, pmap_);
135  }
136 
138 
147  void init_struct(const VariableList& target_vars) {
148  if (target_vars != vars_) {
149  perm_ = derived().make_perm(target_vars);
150  trange_ = derived().make_trange(perm_);
151  shape_ = derived().make_shape(perm_);
152  } else {
153  trange_ = derived().make_trange();
154  shape_ = derived().make_shape();
155  }
156 
157  if (override_ptr_ && override_ptr_->shape)
158  shape_ = shape_.mask(*override_ptr_->shape);
159  }
160 
162 
168  void init_distribution(World* world,
169  const std::shared_ptr<pmap_interface>& pmap) {
170  TA_ASSERT(world);
171  TA_ASSERT(pmap);
172  TA_ASSERT(pmap->procs() ==
173  typename pmap_interface::size_type(world->size()));
174  TA_ASSERT(pmap->size() == trange_.tiles_range().volume());
175 
176  world_ = world;
177  pmap_ = pmap;
178  }
179 
181 
185  Permutation make_perm(const VariableList& target_vars) const {
186  return target_vars.permutation(vars_);
187  }
188 
190 
195  op_type make_op() const {
196  if (perm_ && permute_tiles_)
197  return derived().make_tile_op(perm_);
198  else
199  return derived().make_tile_op();
200  }
201 
203  derived_type& derived() { return *static_cast<derived_type*>(this); }
204 
206  const derived_type& derived() const {
207  return *static_cast<const derived_type*>(this);
208  }
209 
211 
213  World* world() const { return world_; }
214 
216 
218  const VariableList& vars() const { return vars_; }
219 
221 
223  const Permutation& perm() const { return perm_; }
224 
226 
228  const trange_type& trange() const { return trange_; }
229 
231 
233  const shape_type& shape() const { return shape_; }
234 
236 
238  const std::shared_ptr<pmap_interface>& pmap() const { return pmap_; }
239 
241 
244  void permute_tiles(const bool status) { permute_tiles_ = status; }
245 
247 
250  void print(ExprOStream& os, const VariableList& target_vars) const {
251  if (perm_) {
252  os << "[P " << target_vars << "]"
253  << (permute_tiles_ ? " " : " [no permute tiles] ")
254  << derived().make_tag() << vars_ << "\n";
255  } else {
256  os << derived().make_tag() << vars_ << "\n";
257  }
258  }
259 
261 
263  const char* make_tag() const { return ""; }
264 
265 }; // class ExprEngine
266 
267 } // namespace expressions
268 } // namespace TiledArray
269 
270 #endif // TILEDARRAY_EXPRESSIONS_EXPR_ENGINE_H__INCLUDED
